metadata.dc:author: González Cerna, J L
Pérez Treviño, C
Hurtado del Río, D
Holden Barker, A M
Martínez Valdivieso, E Z
metadata.dc:description: A case of right ventricular tumor in a 14 year old male is presented. Congestive heart failure and a systolic pulmonary murmur due to right ventricular obstruction were the main symptoms. The diagnosis was confirmed by echocardiogram (M mode) and right ventricular angiography. The surgical treatment was curative and the histological exam revealed a myxoma.
metadata.dc:title: Mixoma del ventrículo derecho. Informe de un caso operado.
[Myxoma of the right ventricle. Report of a case operated on].
metadata.dc:publisher: Archivos del Instituto de Cardiologia de Mexico
